description.brief: EchoTree: Display word tree as user types

package.description: EchoTree helps conversation with mute persons, who can type. A statistically driven word tree visualization is visible to the voice enabled conversation partner P. The tree continuously updates as the mute person M types on their screen. P can then guess and call out what M might be wishing to type. The system works for in-person conversations and over the telephone.
package.author: Andreas Paepcke
